posts.post_content:
Slowly chipping away at a T207 set, currently at 119/207.  Looking for the following cards, raw or graded, in VGish condition.  Wrinkles/creases are ok so long as they don't break the color on the front.  Interested in all backs except for Red Cross.  Let me know what you have & thanks!

Have Herzog PSA 4 (mk) no ad, Quinn SGC 5 Recruit, Bresnahan SGC 3 Recruit, Gowdy  nice SGC 2 Recruit. Will get you some scans later today. Good luck with the set. T207s are beautiful; they deserve more love than they get.

ETA: Scans sent Monday midnight Pacific time.
